Name: Bloody Mary
Ingredients: 8 drop Hot pepper sauce (red vinegar-based e.g. Tabasco)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
RIM glass with salt (moisten outside edge with lime juice and dip into salt).
Prepare garnish of celery stick and skewered cherry tomato, gherkin and cocktail onion.
ROLL (rotate shaker over and over, rather than shake) all ingredients with ice.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass. Use ice from freezer (rather than ice machine/chest) to fill glass to avoid unwanted dilution.
Garnish with celery stick and skewered cherry tomato, gherkin and cocktail onion.
